Title: Beyond Blue Skies
Description: A full-featured mobile shoot 'em up game with RPG mechanics, featuring an original soundtrack, dialogue, and unlockable content. The player steers a spaceship through procedurally created levels, fighting a variety of enemies and avoiding environmental obstacles while collecting power-ups.
Features: Procedurally generated levels for a new play experience every time
RPG mechanics - players are able to use collected currency to improve their ship, unlocking new weapons and defenses
Google Play integration - players are able to sign in with Google Play to unlock achievements and save their game to the cloud

Title: To Do List
Description: A vanilla Javascript implementation of an advanced To Do List, featuring a list which can be rearranged using drag and drop, and an advanced text editor.
Features: Uses IndexedDb for persistent local storage
Modular code allows for easy replacement of independent systems
Responsive layout works for a variety of displays

Title: Calc You Later
Description: A robust scientific calculator created using the React framework.
Features: Supports a wide variety of functions
Allows input both using on-screen buttons and keyboard entry
Maintains a history of previous calculations

Title: Match Three Unity
Description: An example Match Three game for the Unity3D game engine which provides an expandable framework to create Match Three style games.
Features: Can match objects based on different characteristics (shape, color, etc.)
Physics-based implementation can work with different playing field shapes

Title: Serializable Collections for Unity
Description: A library which adds support for serializing a variety of collections to the Unity3D game engine and updates the Unity3D editor to support viewing those collections.
Features: Cleaner code use than similar solutions

Title: Green Mamba Stealth
Description: An extension for Unity3D which provides a system to analyze the way lighting affects an object and determine whether that object should be considered "hidden" for an NPC observer.
Features: Uses shaders for much of processing, utilizing the GPU for efficiency
Can be easily integrated with without modifying code
